data.title: Foundation Seminars, 1955-2004
data.meta_site_name: Cowles Foundation for Research in Economics
data.text: 1955 Oct. 4 Harry Markowitz, The RAND Corporation, “Portfolio Selection” Nov. 1 James Duesenberry, Harvard University, “Investment and the Theory of the Firm” Nov. 29 David Gale, Brown University, “The Closed Linear Model of Production” Dec. 15 Theodore W.
